text: Bad Vibes Forever is the fourth and last studio album by American rapper, XXXTentacion. Bad Vibes Forever was released posthumously on December 6, 2019. It was the last studio album that was released after his murder. On December 23, 2017, while on house arrest, X announced the album along with Skins and ?. On the one year anniversary of X's murder, his estate reannounced the release of the album along with the documentary Look at Me. On Bad Vibes Forever, he has features from notable artists like rappers Lil Wayne, Rick Ross, Joyner Lucas, singer Noah Cyrus, and pop punk band Blink-182. The album debuted at #5 on the Billboard 200 and selling 65,000 album-equivalent units. The album featured the singles "Royalty", "Hearteater", and "Bad Vibes Forever". ==Songs== ==References== Category:2019 albums Category:XXXTentacion albums Category:Empire Distribution albums
title: Bad Vibes Forever
